components.description:
A pair of socks, generally used to keep one's feet warm and protected.

Generally depicted as two matching socks with a block color and one or more lines around where the socks would cover the wearer's ankles.

JoyPixel's design previously featured a ðŸ’© Pile of Poo emoji pattern.

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

  • ðŸ˜ƒ Emoji 5.0 list

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, a pair of cozy socks is rendered with plush texture and soft, rounded edges, showcasing Apple's signature 3D shading. Each sock is depicted in a pleasing pastel blue, with subtle gradients that suggest a comfortable, worn-in feel. These charming socks on Apple devices are perfect for conveying warmth, comfort, or a sense of relaxation in digital conversations.
